############################################################

        Install SFML into this directory

1. [source: https://github.com/SFML/SFML ] => Releases
2. Downdload package {SFML 2.5.1}

3. File structure:

  - Noware
    - extern
      - SFML
        - bin (dynamic link libs)
        - include (header files)
        - lib (static link libs)

4. Copy all the lib files from bin to <user>/Noware/Noware/
   (visual studio as ${ProjectDir})
